dt: {bc}things of a spiritual, ecclesiastical, or religious nature
{bc}a religious song usually of a deeply emotional character that was developed especially among Black people in the southern U.S.
{bc}any of a party of 13th and 14th century Franciscans advocating strict observance of a rule of poverty for their order

shortdef: things of a spiritual, ecclesiastical, or religious nature
a religious song usually of a deeply emotional character that was developed especially among Black people in the southern U.S.
any of a party of 13th and 14th century Franciscans advocating strict observance of a rule of poverty for their order
